dyeing.name: Dyeing
dyeing.description: Process where dyes are applied to the fabric to give it a uniform color or specific patterns, improving its appearance and versatility.

printing.name: Printing
printing.description: Technique for applying designs to the fabric surface using inks or dyes, creating decorative and personalized patterns. In our case, it's digital printing (more sustainable, better quality, more flexibility).

fireproof.name: Fireproof Finishing
fireproof.description: Process that increases fabric resistance to fire, used in textiles for protective clothing and industrial applications.

antimicrobial.name: Anti-Microbial Finishing
antimicrobial.description: Application of substances that inhibit microorganism growth, providing protection against bacteria and fungi and extending product life.

sanforized.name: Sanforized
sanforized.description: Treatment that reduces shrinkage in cotton or linen fabrics.

calendering.name: Calendering
calendering.description: Compression procedure that gives the fabric a smooth, shiny finish with greater density, improving its appearance and texture.

antipilling.name: Anti-pilling Treatment
antipilling.description: Finish that reduces the formation of pills on the fabric, prolonging its new appearance and improving product quality.

mercerized.name: Mercerized
mercerized.description: Caustic soda treatment applied to cotton fabrics to improve their shine, strength, and dye absorption capacity, achieving a more shiny and silky finish.

wrinkleresistant.name: Wrinkle-resistant Finish
wrinkleresistant.description: Process that allows fabrics to resist wrinkles and maintain a smoother appearance, facilitating care and reducing the need for ironing.

softfinish.name: Soft Finish
softfinish.description: Use of softening agents to improve fabric softness and feel, increasing comfort when in contact with skin.

stainresistant.name: Stain-resistant Finish
stainresistant.description: Application of substances that make fabrics resistant to liquid or oil stains, improving their durability and appearance in daily use.

hydrophilic.name: Hydrophilic Finish
hydrophilic.description: Finish that allows fabrics to absorb more water, ideal for kitchen products such as napkins or kitchen towels.

tumbler.name: Tumbler Finish
tumbler.description: A mechanical process to soften fabrics, providing a softer touch and a more natural and fluffy appearance.

fabrics.title: FABRICS
